item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Monday 1/23/2012's Location will be:

Happy New Bar!

Michael's Downtown Restaurant

Michael's just opened up in December in Downtown New Haven!  Located on Court Street near the corner with Orange (the former location of The Blue Pearl), Michael's offer a cozy atmosphere with various food and drink options.  There is a full bar, wine selections including a neato vacuum sealed machine, hot sandwiches, seafood, and fancy Italian dishes.  You may be familiar with Michael's other location"Michael's Trattoria" in Wallingford.

This is our first trip to the New Haven Location though, so lets give them the welcome to the area and come on out for a drink!

The Owner Michael has generously offered to give us a sampling of Appetizers!

There will also be a drink special, announced that evening.

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people! 

For Happy Hour type events, if you are only a "Maybe" please put this in your RSVP Comment.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can try to Call/Text AJ; number below. We're also probably amongst the largest groups at the Bar for a Monday.
